name: ESSENTIAL MONTREAL
description: Whether for travellers with short stays that want to visit the highlights of the city in a time efficient and organized manner, or for people that want to benefit from the help of a local expert and see different visions of the city than just the apparent ones, this tour will fulfill your need of seeing the essential elements of Montreal, while also giving time to the small details that give the city its character, and excursions that makes the stay memorable.
